statements: SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE measurement_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY measurement_date DESC
SELECT AVG(metric_value) AS average_metric_value, metric_name FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY metric_name
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY metric_name HAVING AVG(metric_value) > 80;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT metric_name) AS unique_metrics FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT metric_name) > 3;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value, MIN(metric_value) AS min_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE employee_id = 1
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY employee_id DESC
SELECT * FROM goals_data WHERE is_achieved = TRUE
SELECT goal_id, employee_id, goal_description FROM goals_data WHERE target_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY employee_id ASC, measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT metric_name, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE employee_id = 100 GROUP BY metric_name HAVING avg_value > 50 ORDER BY avg_value DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT metric_name) AS total_metrics FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY total_metrics DESC;

SELECT p.employee_id, p.metric_name, p.metric_value, g.goal_description FROM performance_metrics p INNER JOIN goals_data g ON p.employee_id = g.employee_id WHERE g.is_achieved = TRUE ORDER BY p.metric_value DESC, g.target_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(metric_value) AS max_value FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING max_value > 100 ORDER BY max_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM performance_metrics WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT kpi_name, current_value, status FROM KPIs ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT goal_description, due_date FROM goal_setting WHERE employee_id = 200 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE date_collected >= '2022-01-01' AND date_collected <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value, date_collected FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY metric_name ASC;
SELECT goal_description, due_date, employee_id FROM goal_setting WHERE employee_id = 1000;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE status = 'On Track' ORDER BY current_value DESC;
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value, date_collected FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value > 80;
SELECT goal_description, due_date, employee_id FROM goal_setting WHERE due_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics;
SELECT metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE achieved_value > target_value;
SELECT kpi_name, target_value FROM KPIs ORDER BY kpi_name DESC;
SELECT goal_description, target_date FROM GoalSetting WHERE employee_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_name = 'Productivity' ORDER BY metric_value DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100 ORDER BY metric_value ASC;
SELECT pm.review_id, pm.employee_id, g.goal_description FROM PerformanceManagement pm INNER JOIN GoalSetting g ON pm.employee_id = g.employee_id WHERE pm.review_date = '2023-06-30';
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, achieved_value FROM KPIs WHERE achieved_value < target_value;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(metric_value) AS max_metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING max_metric_value > 500;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceMetrics ORDER BY measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_value > 1000 AND measurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE metric_name LIKE 'Revenue%' ORDER BY metric_value DESC;
SELECT department, AVG(metric_value) AS avg_metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics JOIN Employees ON PerformanceMetrics.employee_id = Employees.id GROUP BY department;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Departments JOIN Employees ON Departments.id = Employees.id GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC;
SELECT employee_id, metric_name, metric_value FROM PerformanceMetrics WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, hire_date, department FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT kpi_name, target_value, kpi_description FROM KPIs WHERE target_value > 1000
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM Departments WHERE department_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(metric_name) AS num_metrics FROM PerformanceMetrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_metrics > 5
